nodes.bodyText: I suggest we put this into the guided-tour section below where all other properties are configured
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -106,6 +106,10 @@ jhipster:
 
 # Properties to be exposed on the /info management endpoint
 info:
+    tutorial-course-groups: # Names of the tutorial groups that will be automatically added to newly created users

nodes.bodyText: you could then name it course-group-students, etc.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -106,6 +106,10 @@ jhipster:
 
 # Properties to be exposed on the /info management endpoint
 info:
+    tutorial-course-groups: # Names of the tutorial groups that will be automatically added to newly created users

nodes.bodyText:
do we really need tutors here? The tutorial is mainly meant for students.
There should only be a few instructors and tutors and it might be fine, if those are added manually
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -106,6 +106,10 @@ jhipster:
 
 # Properties to be exposed on the /info management endpoint
 info:
+    tutorial-course-groups: # Names of the tutorial groups that will be automatically added to newly created users
+        students: 'artemis-artemistutorial-students'
+        tutors: 'artemis-artemistutorial-tutors'

nodes.bodyText:
I agree on that, as I don't think tutor's and instructor's group assignment is essential. But as these properties are optional and can simply be removed from the property file, I would leave that possibility too.
In this case, the "tutors" and "instructors" properties could be excluded from the application-dev.yml file and included only if needed.
If there is a "properties-policy" I don't know, I can of course leave these two out and refactor the methods.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -106,6 +106,10 @@ jhipster:
 
 # Properties to be exposed on the /info management endpoint
 info:
+    tutorial-course-groups: # Names of the tutorial groups that will be automatically added to newly created users
+        students: 'artemis-artemistutorial-students'
+        tutors: 'artemis-artemistutorial-tutors'

nodes.bodyText: I assume this needs to be added to the documentation as well: https://github.com/ls1intum/Artemis/blob/ad6300c68b1ea0174d92497a54be51305e38731f/docs/dev/guided-tour.rst#extend-configuration-file
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -107,6 +107,8 @@ jhipster:
 # Properties to be exposed on the /info management endpoint
 info:
     guided-tour:
+        # Names of the tutorial groups that will be automatically added to newly created users
+        course-group-students: 'artemis-artemistutorial-students'

nodes.bodyText:
Good point, thank you!
I've now integrated the new property in the documentation with 43dfa49
nodes.diffHunk:
